resources.string: This OS OpenNames data source has not yet been extracted. \n\nTo extract, use the button below.
Please wait, initialising the OS data source…
Extracting OS OpenNames places from data source. Please be patient, this process can take up to 30 minutes…
Ordnance Survey OpenNames data is available to other apps on this device. \n\nThere are currently %d items in the database, extracted from: %s

Apps that wish to exploit this data may use the client library available from the offline-locations-lib project:

https://github.com/front-line-tech/offline-locations-lib

Alternatively, the ContentProvider is documented at the same location and may be accessed through Android\'s ContentResolver class.

Authority:

Data is sourced from Ordnance Survey OpenNames dataset:
